title: Healthy Recipe Analyzer
description: Built a nutrition-aware recipe classifier to suggest healthier ingredient alternatives.

title: Wildfire Damage Prediction
description: Used XGBoost to predict damage severity based on structural and environmental features.

description: Built a responsive personal portfolio with dark/light mode toggle and GitHub stats.

title: Air Quality Dashboard
description: Visualized real-time PM2.5 levels from EPA APIs in an interactive D3 chart.

title: Finance Risk Modeling
description: Modeled risk scores for financial clients using logistic regression and A/B testing.

title: Climate Policy Visualizer
description: Created a multi-view interactive map of AB32 climate outcomes using Tableau.

title: Movie Genre Classifier
description: Classified IMDb movie descriptions using Naive Bayes and TF-IDF vectorization.

title: CV Generator
description: Automated résumé layout generation from structured YAML content.

title: GitHub Activity Tracker
description: Tracked public activity via GitHub’s API and visualized with grid-based summaries.
